site.description: An Eclipse plugin to boost the integration of java apps with Headless CMS (WordPress or Drupal). Extract and discover the content inside the CMS, and generate, automatically, a java library in charge of the communication between the apps.

category-def.name: CMS Discover
category-def.label: CMS Discover
category-def.description: An Eclipse plugin to boost the integration of java apps with Headless CMS (WordPress or Drupal). Extract and discover the content inside the CMS, and generate, automatically, a java library in charge of the communication between the apps.
